In England, in the seven days to 29 April, there were 12,935 new confirmed cases (23.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 April, there were 14,213 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 9% (1,278 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 04 May is 3,865,013 (6,866.6 cases per 100,000 population).
